Description:
Identifies two sign-ins originating from geographically distant locations, where at least one of the locations may also be atypical for the user, given past behavior.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Atypical Travel
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'unlikelytravel'
